original_text: But the people did not receive him, because his face was set toward Jerusalem.
korean_text: 예수께서 예루살렘을 향하여 가시기 때문에 그들이 받아들이지 아니 하는지라

sentences.original_text: But the people did not receive him
because his face was set toward Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 얼굴이 예루살렘을 향하고 있었기 때문입니다.
